criteria.criterion: Weight-bearing X-rays must be completed within 60 days
Physical therapy must be attempted and documented (minimum 6 weeks)
Clinical notes must be within 30 days
Patient must have a valid clinical indication: positive mcmurray, post-operative, meniscal tear, red flag
Evidence must be validated with no hallucinations
